Metadata.Name: Sonic Mania Menus Genesis Remixes
Metadata.Author: BetaNCourses
Metadata.Description: Ports over dischu's Sonic Mania: SEGA Genesis Soundtrack (specifically the menu themes) and PTKay's Double Take (Mega Drive Mix) to Sonic 3 A.I.R. This mod has support for fadeinside's Mania Data Select Music and leanycat's Sound Additions Plus
